bibl.title: Meinarti II. The Early and Classic Christian Phases. Avec résumé en arabe. (Sudan Archaeological Research Society. Publication 6 = BAR International Series. 966.)
bibl.note: 16 tabl., 52 figg., 3 plans dépl. et 40 pll. + 7 plans sous pochette.

Suite de: Meinarti I. The Late Meroitic, Ballana and Transitional Occupation. Avec résumé en arabe = Sudan Archaeological Research Society. Publication 5 = BAR International Series. 895 (Oxford, 2000). - Excavations sponsored by the Sudan Government Antiquities Service with assistance from UNESCO, 1963-1964. - Introduction. - Phase 3: The Early Christian and Early Classic Christian Occupation [ca. AD 650-1000]. - Phase 4: The Later Classic Christian Occupation [ca. AD 1000-1200]. - Appendix. Bibliography. - Pp. 68-71: Mural Inscriptions and Paintings; - 99: Tombstone fragment.
ADAMS William Y., Meinarti II. The Early and Classic Christian Phases. Avec résumé en arabe. (Sudan Archaeological Research Society. Publication 6 = BAR International Series. 966.)
Oxford, Archaeopress, 2001, 4°, xi-123 pp., 16 tabl., 52 figg., 3 plans dépl. et 40 pll. + 7 plans sous pochette. ISBN 1-84171-253-1. £52.
